message.raw: Fix for dTRIMESH_ENABLED support to allow "#define dTRIMESH_ENABLED 0" to disable trimesh operation correctly. NOTE: "#define dTRIMESH_ENABLED" is no longer supported, you must use "#define dTRIMESH_ENABLED 1" to use trimeshes, as per the default config file.
